title: Preschool Adventures-1
description:
Fun game that teaches preschool kids numbers, colors, shapes, animals, and more
Preschool Adventures-1 is a wonderful game with educational puzzles for 3-4-year old kids.
Completely safe, this game is a perfect tool to help your child grow, learn, and have fun at the same time. Even very small children can learn and improve their skills and cognitive abilities, which will give them more advantage later in life, before or during school. And it also gives the parents some time off. You can sit and relax while your children are learning and having fun. The game is suitable for little girls and little boys alike.
The game has 36 puzzles in four fun, colorful, and educational sections, specifically designed to contribute to, exercise, and develop your child's cognitive skills and general knowledge.
While playing the game your child learns the names, meanings (and sounds, if applicable) of:
✔ Numbers (from 1 to 10)
✔ Geometric shapes (square, circle, triangle, etc.)
✔ Animals (including the sounds they make)
✔ Colors
✔ Fruits and vegetables
✔ Vehicles (including the sounds they make)
✔ Electric appliances (including the sounds they make)
✔ Clothes
✔ Sea creatures, and more...
Additionally, the child learns some of the more abstract concepts, including:
✔ Distinguishing between sizes (big, medium, and small)
✔ Matching different objects in the same category
✔ Recognizing an object by its silhouette (shadow)
✔ Recognizing the same object in different orientations (multilateral awareness)
The game includes the appropriate sounds of animals, birds, musical instruments, cars, tools, dolls, and so on. These (and other) sounds are played on each correct answer.
❣ All the puzzles were prepared by a specialist in the field of child mental development.
❣ The game was tested on dozens of children prior to its release.
❣ The game is available at Apple and Amazon app stores as well.
❣  The game is available in 12 languages: English(United states), English( United kingdom),
Germany, Spanish, Russian, French, Portuguese, Italian, Turkish, Arabic, Polish, Dutch!
Our goal at Kideo is to provide the best value for your children, allowing them to develop visual and cognitive abilities, to learn to communicate with their peers and the environment around them, and to acquire important life skills. Each game is designed by a professional for the specific age group.
Let your kid have fun and learn with our wonderful Preschool Adventures game!
